General.Name: Actblue Co Ltd
General.Description: ActBlue Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and sells diesel, gasoline, and natural gas engine exhaust after-treatment products. Its products are used for emission testing and calibration applications in vehicles. ActBlue Co., Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is based in Chizhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. Renjian  Jiang
1.Title: CFO, Assistant to the GM & Director

2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
